summary: Test module that validates the safety features of a Stable Diffusion image generation pipeline, providing quick unit tests with lightweight dummy components across various schedulers and precisions, as well as integration tests that verify the pipeline blocks or filters unsafe content such as harmful or nudity-related images.
business_intent: Guarantee that AI-powered image generation complies with safety policies, prevents the creation of disallowed or explicit content, and protects brand reputation and user trust.
